thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Dragomir Milosavljević
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Dragomir Milosavljević

author: Dragomir Milosavljević
title: Dragomir Milosavljević
text:
I've been buying stuff from Banggood store for years now, I'm very satisfied with my purchases.
Great Price, Great Quality, and Stellar Customer Service!!
The very few times I had any issues with my order, their customer service was very kind and understanding, and resolved the issue within minutes!
The best support in the business! Thank you!
